subject: Add multi-model comparison infrastructure
body:
Major Changes:
- Added MODEL_FAMILIES metadata system with 7 model families
- Created universal metrics calculator (CAC, LTV, LTV:CAC, payback period, growth rates)
- Replaced dropdown selector with checkbox-based multi-select UI grouped by family
- Implemented tabbed input forms for multiple model configuration
- Built comparison views:
  * Universal metrics panel for cross-model comparison
  * Family overlay charts (same family models on one chart)
  * Side-by-side charts (different family models)
  * Month-by-month comparison table
- Updated calculation engine to handle multiple models simultaneously
- Added smart comparison logic based on model family compatibility

UI Updates:
- Checkbox selector with family grouping and descriptions
- Selected models summary display
- Tabbed input forms for multi-model configuration
- Universal metrics comparison cards
- Comparison charts container with overlay/side-by-side logic
- Month-by-month data table for all selected models

Documentation:
- Updated claude.md with new goals and architecture
- Added note to keep claude.md updated with changes
- Documented model families and comparison strategy
